ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Anderson tries to escape from the demon world while Judge Walters works on re-opening the portal.
An old man owns a shop that sells absolutely everything.
An artist named Kenny Who? comes to Mega City to apply for a job as a comic artist but runs into obstacles.
Micky Swift and Cockburn wait on the negotiations with the Guardians of the Food Mountains.
